concepts.SERUM_GLUCOSE_9_DESC: Laboratory measurement of the glucose level in the blood in mg/ml
concepts.BODY_MASS_INDEX_16_DESC:
Body Mass Index (BMI) is a relationship between weight and height that is associated with body fat and health risk.

The equation is BMI = body weight in kilograms/height in meters squared.
concepts.PROTEINURIA_17_DESC: The presence of albumin (protein) in the urine.
concepts.PROVIDER_TYPE_5_DESC: The type of the provider making the evaluation.
concepts.MICROALBUMIN_IN_URINE_BY_TEST_STRIP_19: Microalbumin in urine by test strip
concepts.PULSE_11_DESC: Patient pulse rate, as measured with a peripheral oximeter.
concepts.MICROALBUMIN_IN_URINE_BY_TEST_STRIP_19_D: Semiquantitative test of microalbumin in urine using a test strip
concepts.ALBUMIN/CREATININE_RATIO_(MASS_RATIO)_IN: Albumin/creatinine ratio (mass ratio) in 24 hour urine
